description: Ski touring and ski-mountaineering pants for cold conditions. Lightly insulated with PrimaLoft® Silver Insulation and built with waterproof Proflex™they offer the stretch, comfort, and breathability of a softshell with the protection of a hardshell.
name: Rab Khroma Diffract Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.key: 20D Proflex™ Stretch Woven Nylon 2-layer Waterproof Technology (84 g/m²) HH
